experiences.name: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.short: Currently working as a Software Engineer Intern at Anakin (YC21), responsible for developing a generic scraper for HTML-based content.

experiences.name: Software Development Intern
experiences.short: Worked as a Software Development Intern at The One World, helping design and develop a containerized fast API backend for a large-scale social media platform.

experiences.name: Artificial Intelligence Intern

experiences.name: Machine Learning Intern
experiences.short: Worked as a Machine Learning Intern at UFF Foods, responsible for ETL (Extract, Transform, and Load) for NLP and developing a Selenium scraper for Zomato.
